about_the_game:
Lirai: Heir Of Darkness is a thrilling third-person action game set in a post-apocalyptic world. The Earth, once full of life, is now filled with dangerous enemies - zombies, demons, giant monsters and tough human survivors - all fighting for dominance.

The game has an intense feel, with varied environments and complex character relationships. The storyline reveals dark secrets about what led to the world's collapse. Players will navigate through this dangerous world, using their combat skills and various strategies to survive and uncover the truth in a place where chaos reigns. What remains in the world of horror that leads to destruction and chaos?

You play as Brian, a Knight and one of humanity’s last hopes. Arming himself with skill and determination, Brian embarks on the greatest mission of all time—to save whatever remains of mankind. His journey will be such a trial to his limits when he goes up against all odds in a world where danger lurks.

Overview: Lirai follows the journey of Brian, a false warrior in a world ravished by an unrelenting apocalypse. A multitude of demons and zombies, too many for one to bear, have overpopulated the Earth, with humanity on the brink of being wiped out entirely. In desperation, the surviving humans unite as the last standing army against them all. Amidst the chaos, Brian must uncover the secrets to ensure the future of humanity while fighting his way through.



"It is no longer a personal preference to save the world. Mankind has to claim what has been lost." ~

Prepare for intense combat, strategic gameplay, and a gripping story that will keep you on the edge of your seat. Humanity’s future is in your hands.


Key features:

  • Action-intense sword combat. Fast-paced combat against a variety of enemies

  • The narrative of Lirai focuses on the complex relationships between characters and the story that led to the apocalyptic chaos. Through storytelling and characters, uncover the mysteries behind the downfall. Emotional depth and character growth are at the heart of the story.

  • Various playable transformations- Each with unique abilities and appearances. These transformations have different gameplay mechanics and strategies. Each form brings different playstyles.

  • Each level in Lirai has its own mysteries and puzzles designed to encourage the player to explore and think critically. The player will be tasked with complex puzzles to get through, uncover hidden secrets, and solve the story's puzzle.

  • Embark with Brian on his journey as he explores through the story and in-game discoveries toward a quest to save humanity from abomination and extinction.

content_descriptors.notes:
Lirai: An Intense Post-Apocalyptic Survival Game

In Lirai, players enter a post-apocalyptic world overrun by zombies in a third-person action game. It offers challenging combat and mature themes, without crossing into explicit content territory.

Action and Combat: Players will engage in fast-paced, tactical combat with melee weapons, firearms, and environmental hazards. The game features depictions of injury and moderate gore.

Violence and Battle:  While combat is central to the gameplay, the focus remains on action, with violence kept within appropriate bounds.

Flashing Lights Warning: Some sequences feature flashing lights during high-energy moments. Players sensitive to flashing visuals should be cautious.

No Explicit Content: Lirai does not contain depictions of sexual assault, non-consensual acts, or drug or alcohol abuse. The game stays within clear, responsible boundaries for audiences.

Player Advisory: It contains combat, violence, and survival themes that may not be suitable for younger players. Those sensitive to moderate blood and flashing lights should consider this before playing.
